channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 9 best ski resorts on the East Coast to plan a trip around this winter
item.description: There’s no denying it — when it comes to skiing in the U.S., there’s nothing like skiing out west. But, for those closer to the East Coast, it’s often...

item.title: Can someone else use my Global Entry application credit?

item.title: How common is norovirus on cruise ships? Here’s why you shouldn’t worry
item.description: What’s sneaky, super contagious and bound to cause diarrhea and vomiting? If you answered “norovirus,” you’d be correct. But what is it, and why is it...
